artefact.overview: You need a licence to sell non-medical poisons in the UK
artefact.licence_short_description: Licence to sell non-medical poisons in the UK (eg caustic soda, chemical toilet fluids, drain cleaners).
artefact.licence_overview:
To sell a range of chemicals including caustic soda, chemical toilet fluids, drain cleaners and some pesticides and weed killers, you need to be registered with your local authority. 

The chemicals are listed in [Part II of the Poisons Act](http://www.legislation.gov.uk/ukpga/1972/66 "Poison's Act 1972"){:rel="external"} and are referred to as non-medicinal poisons.

details.description: Applying for licences from your council for events and businesses
Information about starting up and running a business in the UK, including help if you're self employed or a sole trader.
